0 Param data.1 string m_text: The Night Devil...
I should have guessed you'd come back here when you had nowhere else to go.
Well, well, well. Master Night Devil.
You were just a sniveling child the last time I saw you. I guess you really took my lessons to heart.
Word is you're looking into that kid that snuffed it here.
She didn't "snuff it." She was murdered.
Same difference.
You still able to hear 'em? The dead, I mean.
I am.
Can't be easy.
Please... Hurry...
Thank you for coming.
Do you remember who killed you?
I remember. The scary people. In the mines past the ruins.
That's where you'll find them.
You must hate them for what they did to you.
I detest them.
It's their fault I can't ever see my dad again.
I miss him so much it hurts. I'll never forgive them for what they did to me.
But...
But what?
I feel like I'm forgetting...something.
How 'bout this.
I'll take care of the ones who did this to you. You work on remembering.
Who are you!?
Are you the ones who kidnapped and murdered that little girl?
I-It's him! The Night Devil!
The Night Devil, eh? What do you want?
I asked if you're the ones who murdered that girl.
So what if we did?
Then die.
Spare me! Please!
She tried to run, and I...I went to grab her, but I was too rough. Next thing I knew she was dead.
It was an accident, I swear. I even prayed for her and everything, so she'd pass on in peace!
None of this would have happened if we'd told her stepmother to go stuff it.
Her stepmother?
That old hag's the one told us to kidnap her daughter in the first place.
Yeah—yeah, if anyone's the victim here, it's us!
You understand...right?
Die.
Leave.
Die.
You don't deserve to live.
Leave.
Death is too good for you.
Looks like you remembered.
I hate them. The ones that separated me from my dad.
I just wanted to be with him.
Now I understand why you're Lost.
It was your hatred for everyone who came between you and your father.
But I'll take care of it.
Dad...
Your daughter wants to see you.
What do you choose?
I'd be happy to send you to her, if you want to see her too.
But if not, I will kill you.
What are you saying?
Answer the question.
Of course I want to see her. That's the whole reason we pray, isn't it? So we can meet again in the next life?
Very well.
Don't let her out of your sight this time.
Death is too good for you.
Never go near that girl again.

Treachery. Spite. Malice. How quickly they can overwhelm a person's heart.

Again and again I strike at them.

Again and again I kill.

I thought I made my peace when I chose this path, but I grow more weary with every step...
You look worse for wear.
Leave me be.
Don't snap at me.
I've only come to offer what advice I can to my former pupil.
You need to be careful.
You know the Blood Guard has its eye on you. Ever think about lying low for a while?
That won't change anything.
So be it. Just watch your back.
He must...be killed...
Off to look for another dead person?
Not dead. Lost.
What is it they're calling you around here now? The Executioner?
I hate that name.
Heh.
To you, you're avenging the dead, but to everyone else, you're just another murderer. Like us.
Don't forget that.
Heh, now now. Don't be jealous.
Was that your voice I heard? Why haven't you moved on yet?
My name is Roma.
I bear him no ill will. I only wish to stop him.
Stop who?
My best friend.
He'll destroy everything if we don't do something.
He may even kill the sovereign.
Tell me his name.
Zodian, of the Blood Guard.
He never had any qualms voicing his doubts about reincarnation.
Then one day he joined the Blood Guard.
I assumed that meant he'd outgrown those ignorant opinions.
But I was wrong.
Joining the Blood Guard was only part of his plot to kill the sovereign and start a revolution.
He murdered me when I discovered his plot and tried to stop him.
If he wouldn't listen to me, he won't listen to anyone.
There's only one way to stop him now.
Please.
You must kill him.
I'll be waiting for him in the next life.
Very well.
Who are you?
You're the Night Devil. Aren't you?
Why are you here?
It seems we're the same, you and I. Neither of us want to protect the sovereign.
What do you know?
No reason to tell that to a dead man.
I'm not dying here. This realm needs to change. And I'm the one that's going to change it!
Why kill me? Who put you up to this?
You can ask him yourself when you go Beyond.
Beyond the Veil?
Ah... So it was Roma.
I should have known.
He doesn't hate you. He only wanted you stopped.
And you weren't about to stop on your own.
No...I wasn't.
I can't stand the way people take this life for granted, putting all their hopes in the next.
And I'm not the only one.
Nothing can stop the revolution now.
It's time. Time for this realm to change.
And change it will.
So...
What's the point, do you think? Of life, I mean...
Who's there? What are you doing!?
You—you're the Night Devil!
Did you kill this man?
Why shed all this blood?
You don't need to know.
You...
Wait!
It can't be him... Can it?
Commander!
There's been an uprising in Szaka! A mob is advancing on the palace as we speak!
This battle may be won, but the war for this realm's soul is on the horizon.
When it comes, I wonder which side we'll be on.
Don't waste your time on that one. He's stubborn. He won't stray from his path.
Guys like him are tough. Same as you.
Or maybe not. Maybe you're only doing this to fool yourself into thinking you don't have any doubts?
Don't be absurd.
Please... I'm ready to go.
Hearing voices again? No rest for the wicked.
You called?
I was wondering if...if you would kill me.
You look pretty dead already.
Not completely. I'm still half-alive.
I know it might be difficult to understand, but—
Not for me. I've seen this before.
Then you'll help me?
I don't want to burden my son anymore. It'll be easier for him if I just pass.
He'll be free to live his life without me tying him down.
Are you sure?
He said he wanted me to be somewhere where the air was fresh and the water clear.
So he took me to Kiro Marsh.
I know it's a bother to make you travel such a distance.
Don't worry about it.
Thank you.
Now my son can be free.
I brought some fresh-picked fruit. You won't believe how good it smells.
What the—! Who are you?
Hey...
Mom? Mom—wake up!
Wait.
Lord Soju—it is you, isn't it?
Why are you doing this?
It's none of your business.
I disagree!
I'm the one who let you live, after all.
Then what's your plan?
To stop you!
No one wants a murderous member of the Progeny's blood on the loose. Is this you covering your tracks, then?
Make up your mind. One minute you're letting me live, the next you want to kill me.
I don't deny it.
Do you really think you stand a chance?
I'd wager my life on it.
A wager you're going to lose!
Enough!
Strike true, you coward, if you mean to kill me!
What about you? You were holding back. Hesitant, even...
I NEVER hesitate!
Maybe we should work together to right these wrongs, Lord Soju.
Do NOT call me by that name!
I'm sure Lady Sara would be overjoyed to know you're still alive.
The sovereign? Feh.
She's no different from the ones who killed me.
You've misunderstood! Lady Sara knew nothing of that!
To this day, she thinks you set out to see the world and lost your life in an accident.
If you bear a grudge, bear it against me and my fellow liegemen, not Lady Sara!
Are you saying I ought to change my ways?
Do you know how long I have spent in the shadows of this realm?
And you DARE tell me, now, after all this time, to change my ways!?
It's our fault! All of it!
Please! Don't hold it against Lady Sara or the realm!
You don't get to tell me what to do with my hatred.
I beg you!
Cast off that mask and come back to us, Lord Soju!
I told you not to call me that.
But you ARE Lord Soju!
Please!
I know none can claim to understand the pain that you have suffered.
But at least—
At least let me help you bear it.
Your hatred, your bitterness—I will carry it all for you.
All I ask is that you trust her.
Not a day has passed that Lady Sara has not thought of you.
Use your power for her sake.
For the sake of your former life.
I hope I will be with you...in the next life...
Sara...
What is it you want me to do?
You—!
You. Killed. My mother.
So that's how you met your end.
And now I've become you.
Okay, Soju, it's time I took you to see Sara.
